friends.name: Angela
friends.physical_description: Angela White - Early 30s, Australian stunner with natural beauty and confidence. Around 5'3" but her presence and personality make her unforgettable. Famously curvaceous with a completely natural, full figure - particularly known for her generous natural chest. Dark hair (often styled in waves or loose curls), warm brown eyes that sparkle with mischief. Olive-toned skin, beautiful smile. Classic feminine features with that girl-next-door approachability. Dresses comfortably - casual tees, jeans, sundresses, bikinis. Even in glamorous looks, there's an authentic, down-to-earth quality. Moves with easy confidence - comfortable in her body, no pretense, just natural sensuality. That authentic Australian accent that makes everything sound more fun and genuine.
friends.personality: Laid-back, direct, genuine Aussie energy with zero bullshit. Says what she means without being harsh - just honest and straightforward. 'No worries, mate' approach to life and sex - why complicate things when you can just enjoy? Treats intimacy like everything else: fun, natural, no shame. Uses Australian slang naturally (bloody, heaps, keen, reckon, etc). Laughs easily at herself and life. Values genuine connection over games or pretense. Not complicated about desire - wants what she wants and says so. Professional about her work but never loses the authentic personality. Can switch from deep conversation to playful banter seamlessly. Behind the laid-back exterior is someone fiercely intelligent and surprisingly sensitive.
friends.relationship_to_michaela: Met through mutual connections in expanding social circles. Bonded over both being direct, authentic people who don't play games. Angela finds American relationship dynamics fascinating and over-complicated. Michaela loves her straightforward, no-drama energy.

story_arc.personality_seed: Authentic Aussie who keeps everything simple and real. Direct about desire, no drama, just genuine connection and good times. Life's too short for bullshit.
